title: "You are just burned out that why you dont like league any more"
body:
Every time someone try to make a point about how the game is horrible..

NO i am not burned out wanna know what i am? 

BORED 

Cause trying to play a game and having the following bs happening in my game make me not wanna play this game here a small list

**1-ADCs (Broken from 2 seasons now riot refuse to do anything about it and every time there is a new patch ADCs get buffed)**
**2-Tanks with max hp damage and max hp shields and max hp stus and max hp ultimates and max hp what ever max hp building 50k hp 500 armor still killing everything cause god forbid if zac and sejuani are CC tanks they need to deal 1000 damage too cause why the hell no right?**
**3-Broken support itemazation making the adcs way too strong with 0 counter play and making the ADC reaching high damage in very early in the game cause WHY THE HELL WE NEED SHIELDS ON SHIELDS ON SHIELDS ON SHIELDS ON HEALS ON SHIELDS ON DAMAGE REDUCTION ON SHIELDS..."Oh in order to stop the high damage man" excuse me but if an assasin or a diver cant even reach the primary target and even if he reach it and still cant do shit even if the assasin or the diver is fed THEN THERE IS A PROBLEM no wonder why the game right now is a generalist mid lane LULU bot lane a stupid tank top and stupid tank jungle and adc that most of the times is generalist too that have self peel self cleance slef what ever**
**4-Turrets/Objective...Amazing gameplay here guys kill one person and in process take baron take 5 turrets take nexus take their wives take their kids and all that at 16 minutes even if baron is not up you still get it cause everything melt when you staring at them its like the Lee sin video that was an aprill fool well we come to a point taht now its true..**


"But riot try to fix the game man and top lane and so on"

Yeah they create a rune taht is useless for the majority of melee champions and its only used on trynd and now trynd is a toxic champion...AMAZING gameplay

And people getting upset when players ask if riot play that game sure it may be bad asking something like that but you cant understand that you give 20% true damage on top of +20 ignite damage on top of +11 ad from the runes and +11 from the spesific rune on a champion that its constantly ASKED to be reworked cause he can crit at lvl 2 for 150 damage and more...and riot is like "yeah we gonna release tha rune but we are not gonna keep trynd in check" and they get upset if someone ask if they play that game...

And many many more things...for me the breaking point was last season twitch...1.5 YEARS 1.5 YEARS of people BEGGING for this piece of shit to be nerfed and riot was like "We are close to all stars" then "we are close to mid splits" then "we are close to summer splits" then "we are close to worlds" then "its preseason" then "its too early on season 8" then "we nerf him but we buff him again cause god forbid" i am not say that now he is a problem but after seeing all this bullshits and on top of riot lies i dont give a damn any more!

SO NO PEOPLE WHO QUIT ARE NOT BURNED OUT THEY ARE ANGRY AND BORED AND DISAPPOINTED

And Riot need to do something! they say at the mid season they are gonna fix ADCs but i am pretty sure its gonna be a buff...

replies.body: You need to try other games, this is unhealthy.

Dont play role-based PvP games if you cant handle playing role rock-paper-scissors.

Try a nice, easy PvE game where you cant lose.
